languages.text: "Наши кланы все внутри оцепленного отсека. Но нижние палубы большие, наверняка нашлись те, кого совсем все допекло. Нас щемят со всех сторон, возмутившихся солдаты оцепили, отряд карателей пришел... есть от чего слететь с реле".

"Our clans are all inside the bay that's been sealed off. But the lower decks are big — I'm sure there are some people who've had just about enough. We're getting it from all sides, the soldiers have encircled the ones who've risen up, a death squad has just arrived... it's no wonder folks are lashing out."
languages.original_text: "Наши кланы все внутри оцепленного отсека. Но нижние палубы большие, наверняка нашлись те, кого совсем все допекло. Нас щемят со всех сторон, возмутившихся солдаты оцепили, отряд карателей пришел... есть от чего слететь с реле".

We're getting it from all sides, the soldiers have encircled the ones who've risen up, a death squad has just arrived... it's no wonder folks are lashing out."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: “我们的氏族都留在被封锁的区域里，但底层甲板很大，我相信有些人已经受够了。我们从四面八方得到了消息，说士兵已经包围了那些站起来罢工的人，还有一支处决小队刚刚抵达……就算真有人打算拼死一搏，也不是什么怪事。”
languages.original_text: "Our clans are all inside the bay that's been sealed off. But the lower decks are big — I'm sure there are some people who've had just about enough. We're getting it from all sides, the soldiers have encircled the ones who've risen up, a death squad has just arrived... it's no wonder folks are lashing out."

traits.locale_text: “我们的氏族都留在被封锁的区域里，但底层甲板很大，我相信有些人已经受够了。我们从四面八方得到了消息，说士兵已经包围了那些站起来罢工的人，还有一支处决小队刚刚抵达……就算真有人打算拼死一搏，也不是什么怪事。”
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: «Nuestros clanes se encuentran en la bahía sellada, pero las cubiertas inferiores son muy extensas. Tiene que haber gente que haya llegado al límite. Recibimos por todas partes, los soldados han rodeado a los rebeldes, acaba de llegar un escuadrón de la muerte... es normal que la gente reaccione con violencia».
languages.original_text: "Our clans are all inside the bay that's been sealed off. But the lower decks are big — I'm sure there are some people who've had just about enough. We're getting it from all sides, the soldiers have encircled the ones who've risen up, a death squad has just arrived... it's no wonder folks are lashing out."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestros clanes se encuentran en la bahía sellada, pero las cubiertas inferiores son muy extensas. Tiene que haber gente que haya llegado al límite. Recibimos por todas partes, los soldados han rodeado a los rebeldes, acaba de llegar un escuadrón de la muerte... es normal que la gente reaccione con violencia».
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: 「俺達の一族はすべて封鎖されたベイの中にいる。でも、下層デッキは広いんだ。もう十分だという人もいるはずだよ。俺たちは四方八方から攻撃を受けている。兵士たちは立ち上がった者たちを包囲し、さらには死の部隊がやってきた…暴れる人が出るのも無理はないだろう」
languages.original_text: "Our clans are all inside the bay that's been sealed off. But the lower decks are big — I'm sure there are some people who've had just about enough. We're getting it from all sides, the soldiers have encircled the ones who've risen up, a death squad has just arrived... it's no wonder folks are lashing out."

traits.locale_text: 「俺達の一族はすべて封鎖されたベイの中にいる。でも、下層デッキは広いんだ。もう十分だという人もいるはずだよ。俺たちは四方八方から攻撃を受けている。兵士たちは立ち上がった者たちを包囲し、さらには死の部隊がやってきた…暴れる人が出るのも無理はないだろう」
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: "Unsere Clans sind alle in der Bucht, die versiegelt wurde. Aber die Unterdecks sind groß — es gibt gewiss einige, die einfach genug haben. Wir werden von allen Seiten drangsaliert. Die Soldaten haben alle eingekreist, die sich erhoben haben, ein Killerkommando ist gerade einmarschiert ... es ist kein Wunder, dass die Leute sich wehren."
languages.original_text: "Our clans are all inside the bay that's been sealed off. But the lower decks are big — I'm sure there are some people who've had just about enough. We're getting it from all sides, the soldiers have encircled the ones who've risen up, a death squad has just arrived... it's no wonder folks are lashing out."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Clans sind alle in der Bucht, die versiegelt wurde. Aber die Unterdecks sind groß — es gibt gewiss einige, die einfach genug haben. Wir werden von allen Seiten drangsaliert. Die Soldaten haben alle eingekreist, die sich erhoben haben, ein Killerkommando ist gerade einmarschiert ... es ist kein Wunder, dass die Leute sich wehren."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: « Nos clans sont tous enfermés dans le compartiment scellé, mais les ponts inférieurs sont vastes, et c'est sûrement pas les mécontents qui manquent. C'est toujours la même rengaine : les soldats encerclent ceux qui osent se rebiffer, un escadron de la mort débarque pour nous faire un sort... Après ça, faut pas s'étonner que les gens finissent par riposter. »
languages.original_text: "Our clans are all inside the bay that's been sealed off. But the lower decks are big — I'm sure there are some people who've had just about enough. We're getting it from all sides, the soldiers have encircled the ones who've risen up, a death squad has just arrived... it's no wonder folks are lashing out."

traits.locale_text: « Nos clans sont tous enfermés dans le compartiment scellé, mais les ponts inférieurs sont vastes, et c'est sûrement pas les mécontents qui manquent. C'est toujours la même rengaine : les soldats encerclent ceux qui osent se rebiffer, un escadron de la mort débarque pour nous faire un sort... Après ça, faut pas s'étonner que les gens finissent par riposter. »
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: "Klanlarımızın tümü, şu anda kapatılmış bölmelerde yaşıyor. Ancak alt güverte büyüktür, sabrı taşmış birkaç kişi elbet vardır. Dört bir taraftan ensemize biniyorlar. Askerler, isyan edenlerin etrafını sarmış. Üstüne bir de infaz mangası geldi... Ahalinin tepki göstermesine şaşırmamak gerek."
languages.original_text: "Our clans are all inside the bay that's been sealed off. But the lower decks are big — I'm sure there are some people who've had just about enough. We're getting it from all sides, the soldiers have encircled the ones who've risen up, a death squad has just arrived... it's no wonder folks are lashing out."

Askerler, isyan edenlerin etrafını sarmış. Üstüne bir de infaz mangası geldi... Ahalinin tepki göstermesine şaşırmamak gerek."
